issue.title: [C++] Add experimental pull-based iterator structures to C interface implementation
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9761](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9761). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This purpose of this would be to validate some initial use cases / workflows prior to potentially formalizing the interface in the C ABI
